hero.title: Welcome to my portfolio!
hero.subtitle: My name is Marcin Sachs and I am passionate about programming, photography, and AutoCAD design.

csharpSection.title: C# Projects

project1.title: Steel modeling AutoCAD plugin
project1.description: AutoCAD plug-in for modelling of steel components with “3D solid” objects. Overdo enables the creation of lists, the insertion of fasteners and the pre-preparation of prints.

project2.title: Useful  tools for AutoCAD
project2.description: A range of AutoCAD tools to aid design. The plug-in has been written to speed up daily work on timber-frame projects. Among other things, it includes optimised mass printing to PDF files (with a specific name), creation of sheets with predefined settings and many other automations.

otherProgrammingSection.title: Other
otherProgrammingSection.intro: Other projects in which I have participated or am currently participating
otherProgrammingSection.project1Description: Beanconqueror is an app for coffee lovers. My role in this project is to translate it into Polish.

project1.title: Decorative truss model
project1.description: Model of decorative truss. Model was created in AutoCAD using objects of type '3D solid'.
